title: What do you think of this Janna edit?

replies.body: Nice work there! This would be a welcome change~ (Not saying rito did bad on it, they were probably going for trying to make janna look different from most of the other ladies in the game, just didn't go over well.)
I think even with the edit, she looks different from the ladies.
I agree, but I'm talking an **adverse** difference, a more lithe and matured look than broke away from the baby-faced fem-fatal look we get so often.

Yeah I was thinking about that too. I'm all for feminine differences, after all, it's the reason why Riot artists have looked to real-life influences to help their characters be more diverse in face (lady gaga - diana, natalie portman/audrey hepburn - leona, and a few others).

I don't care, you made her look so much better. Her chin was abnormally pointy. Her face was too elfish. I like what you did. Janna is no elf. She is a human who just has pointy ears, mystic blue eyes, and... and... the most beautiful smile I've ever seen.
Looks nice, I don't like the current crimson chin janna.
I don't know, somehow i think the pointy face fits her
I like Riot's version. Stop infantilize female champions!
Her ears are too pointy and she looks so emotionless.  Really dislike the new splash.

Lore wise, I like how ethereal and inhuman the new Janna looks, matches with the description of how her powers changed her. Visually, just doesn't look like Janna to me. Riot's new art is great aesthetically but a lot of it screams MTG more than LoL imo.
well i like the new art but i am just sad they remove her tattoo (i like her white hair)
Was this the one that was posted a couple weeks ago? I could barely tell then, even when he (was it you?) described each change.
I made this just now, so no.. but, I've added a gif so that you can see for yourself (if you wanted to).
Oh I thought it was more than the face. I noticed the facial changes. It looks good, but I don't think it's necessary to give her overly friendly and kind characteristics.
The shape of the head is a lot better, but I don't think she needs that smirk. She looks a bit condescending.
I'll try it without the smirk.
this one looks nice, but try doing an small O mouth as if she was blowing
This looks a lot better than the original; her face is the only thing I don't like about it. You fixed it.

> I'll try it without the smirk.

Love it!
That's how you look when your head's in the clouds and you literally have to look down at everyone.

In the original she looks more bolder and serious, but still beautiful. I like yours but it is just a cuter version of it. In her lore she is supposed to be a crazy powerful mage that should scare people if they saw her. I think that is why I like the original better, That's just my 2 cents.
nice!
yay she looks  like a human rather than a elf
YAY FOR THE SMIRK!!!
I think that she still looks like a girl running around in her underwear.
terrible
I like the edit, the one thing I can't agree with is the nose

She is TOO manly looks!    {{item:3070}}__{{item:3070}} 
 Don't know me wrong and also I know this may not the perfect place to say, but Jannas last splash art would be still beter ( I dont see that one shold be changed, evan it's already got swiched of now), even if there she does not seems like "look down up on the opponent" like somkind of goddess, how ever I felt it much more conecting to her ingame stile and voice. But if it is realy necessary to change at least don't make her jaw such manly looks one ( and with her breasts mesure also would be good a change, on this one she flatter than lux, who a young lady, while Janna one kind of mature woman elf ).
